headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Booking Holdings (BKNG) Embracing OpenAI and Surging Event-Driven Travel Demand
summary: Booking Holdings has announced a collaboration with OpenAI to enhance travel planning through AI-powered tools and reported strong demand for travel to Asian destinations, fueled by major events like the BLACKPINK concert in Bangkok and increased direct flight connections in the region. This integration of AI and surge in event-driven travel interest underscores Booking’s growing role in meeting evolving traveler needs through technology and global reach. We'll explore how Booking's OpenAI...

headline: New Flight Routes from China to Vietnam Sees 90% Boost in Travel Interest
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda has revealed strong growth in interest in travel between China and Vietnam, underlining deepening tourism ties between the two countries following the launch of new flight connections.

raw.headline: New Flight Routes from China to Vietnam Sees 90% Boost in Travel Interest
